##  INTERNAL CAMERA PARAMETERS#
# Generated by some ugly HALCON 13 code written by Andrew to mimic HALCON 12 output.
# versions of HALCON before 13 used ascii output for write_cam_par.
# versions of HALCON after 13 use an undocumented binary blob.
ParGroup: Camera: Parameter;
        "Internal camera parameters";

Focus:foc:0.0175410207692123;
DOUBLE:0.0:;
        "Focal length of the lens";

Poly1:poly1:0.0000000000000000;
DOUBLE::;
        "1st polynomial distortion coefficient";

Poly2:poly2:0.0000000000000000;
DOUBLE::;
        "2nd polynomial distortion coefficient";

Poly3:poly3:0.0000000000000000;
DOUBLE::;
        "3rd polynomial distortion coefficient";

Poly4:poly4:0.0000000000000000;
DOUBLE::;
        "4th polynomial distortion coefficient * 1000";

Poly5:poly5:0.0000000000000000;
DOUBLE::;
        "5th polynomial distortion coefficient * 1000";

Sx:sx:0.0000053035562465;
DOUBLE:0.0:;
        "Width of a cell on the sensor";

Sy:sy:0.0000053068578164;
DOUBLE:0.0:;
        "Height of a cell on the sensor";

Cx:cx:635.0802893361371844;
DOUBLE::;
        "X-coordinate of the image center";

Cy:cy:515.5517528871590685;
DOUBLE::;
        "Y-coordinate of the image center";

ImageWidth:imgw:1280.0000000000000000;
INT:1:32768;
        "Width of the images";

ImageHeight:imgh:1024.0000000000000000;
INT:1:32768;
        "Height of the images";
